attributes.action: stop the high price school trips
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I, as I know many other parents are fed up with all the school trips we are are expected to fund, school trips where the children are under pressure from their friends to go on, and of which a lot of the parents cannot afford to send them on.Try telling your thirteen year old that they will have to stay at home when their friends are away enjoying themselves, this is getting more and more frequent.And , like myself, I am getting myself into more and more debt,through the government deciding to let the schools decide on these trips .
